titleStmt.title: Two Women and Fridge Harran
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.
Private URIs using the rend prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a rendition element in VICAV rendition library.
Private URIs using the assets prefix are pointers to the location of the SHAWI media assets.

spanGrp.span: Master Stephan, once upon a time, there was a man, who had only one room; a long room like this room; it was long and he had only this one room.
That man had only one room, but he had two wives. He was married to two women.
When he went to sleep he laid out (a mattress) and (the women) laid out two mattresses. And he was sleeping in the middle.
The women used to sleep with one sleeping here and the other one there (lit. here).
Sometimes one slept there and the other one slept like this, I mean, they separated from each other.
One day a guest came to him. When he got a guest, he said, “O Lord, what should I do?
I only have one room and this guest wants a place to sleep. He wants to stay overnight at my place, he wants to sleep at my place.”
He grabbed the fridge and put into the room, in the middle of the room. Then he looked around and said to the wife.
He said, “Put the fridge in the middle by having its door at our side and then put a curtain, put a curtain next to the fridge!
As for the guest, spread out his mattress there and spread out ours here! So we can sleep until the morning; we make (such) an arrangement for today.”
The woman did it like this and spread out (the mattresses). In the evening, they were talking and having fun, and at night they were sleeping.
When they were sleeping the women had spread out two mattresses and he was in the middle.
And one was on this side and the other one on that side. And for the guest they had put a mattress for him over there.
It was hot, it was summer, hot, I mean a little bit hot, let’s say – in summer – yes, in summer. At night…
After midnight, after midnight he woke up and nugded the young one. He wanted from her, he wanted from her to do it.
She said to him, “It is a shame! Look, you have a guest, and this one is next to us, the older one is sleeping right next to us, man!”
He said: “Don’t worry about them! My best piece is already erected.
Pull out the thing I want to do it!” She said, “But here it is not possible!”
He said, “So go ahead and open the door of the fridge as if you wanted to drink water! Then and I will come to you and we do it.”
She went and opened the door of the fridge. He came and clasped her from behind, he bent her over, clasped her, rode her and tapped her.
After he had tapped her, his heart had cooled down and he stretched out to sleep.
The older one had seen him and started to nudge him saying, “I want it too.”
“Hey, what do you want?” he said. She said, “The same what the two of you just did. I want to do it too. Get up and do it to me too!”
“Tsk, I take refuge to God from the devil.” He said, “Get up, go to the fridge and then open the fridge!
As if you were drinking water and then I will come.” – “I want it the way you did it. I also want it.”
Then she went and opened the fridge. He clasped her and then he tapped her.
Then they came back, stretched out and slept until the morning.
In the morning, the guest got up, sat down and said, “O landlord of the Merciful, o so-and-so!”
He said, “Yes, what’s the matter with you?” He said “I was dying from thirst last night and you did not give me any water to drink.”
He said, “Man, the fridge was next to you. You could have gotten up, opened the fridge and drunk water.”
He said “Man, you son of a dog! Whoever opens the fridge at night you would fuck him.”
So, I was afraid and I said to myself if I go and open the fridge to drink water, he will come and fuck me, that son of a dog!” Enjoy it!
